snippet: The court led by Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. has been friendlier to corporate interests than any other recent court, according to a new study of the votes of 36 justices serving since 1946.
lead_paragraph: The court led by Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. has been friendlier to corporate interests than any other recent court, according to a new study of the votes of 36 justices serving since 1946.
